level.heading: Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry information challenge process.
level.text: The Commissioner shall establish a process whereby licensees may challenge information entered into the NMLSR by the Commissioner.

level.heading: CREDIT(S)
level.text: (Sept. 9, 1996, D.C. Law 11-155, ยง 21c, as added July 18, 2009, D.C. Law 18-38, ยง 2(o), 56 DCR 4290.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-38, see notes following ยง 26-1101.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: "Except for section 2(c)(1), (g), (j), and (o), this act shall not apply until the Commissioner of the Department of Insurance, Securities, and Banking has promulgated rules implementing this act."
